Talk_Greeting0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, I remember you... What are you up
to today?
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>Hm? Did Purah send you? I'm Saguru.
Nice to meet you. I specialize in studying
the <clr:0000>sky islands<clr:ffff>.
I mean, look at all of these fascinating
ruins just dropping out of the sky!<sp:5:1:0> Great
stuff, right?
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_00>Huh?<sp:5:1:0> Wait, you're not with the
survey team!

This is an official Ring Ruins research site.
It's dangerous here for civilians.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>But if you're the sort of guy who comes
all the way out here for curiosity's sake,
you must be a researcher at heart.
Since you're here, I'm happy to answer
questions. Um, as long as they're about
the <clr:0000>sky islands<clr:ffff>.
Talk_Greeting0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, I remember you... What are you doing
out so late?
Talk_Greeting0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Huh? What are you doing out in rain
like this?
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>We're not sure what lives up there, but
we've found new species of plants around
the fallen ruins.
And if there are plants, I'm sure other
things live up there too.

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_00>If you're interested in that sort of thing...
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You know when you start daydreaming
and stare off into the sky? And then you
go, "whoa, a floating ruin?!"
That's a sky island.


<snd:Happy_00>Remnants of the Zonai civilization, like
these <clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>, have fallen all over.
Turns out they come from the <clr:0000>sky islands<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Which means...


<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>The whole Zonai legacy is up there! The
islands are untouched, so everything must
be well-preserved.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Try talking to <clr:0000>Cori<clr:ffff>. She's our resident
plant expert.

Right now she's trying to <clr:0000>cultivate plants<clr:ffff>
that were attached to the ruins.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We don't have a way to get to the <clr:0000>sky
islands<clr:ffff>. At least, not YET! I'd love to
go someday.
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>I bet the folks in Tarrey Town could improve the
balloon. I wish I had a reason to head northeast...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If that interests you, you should definitely
ask her about it.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Hmm...<sp:5:1:0> I want to know more about <clr:0000>armor<clr:ffff>
made with Zonai tech.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Clothing and culture are tied together,
and there's so much we don't know about
either of them. So many mysteries...
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Anyway, the <clr:0000>bigger the sky island<clr:ffff>, the
bigger the settlements. We think some
sort of <clr:0000>cultural relic <clr:ffff>must be up there.<clr:0000><clr:ffff>
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_00>But since we can't get up there, it's all
conjecture. I'll have to content myself
studying the Ring Ruins.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This is an official Ring Ruins investigation
site... <sp:5:1:0>And it IS dangerous for civilians...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0100>But I respect your curiosity.


Since you came all the way out, I'll answer
any of your questions. Um, as long as
they're about the <clr:0000>sky islands<clr:ffff>.
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>What admirable curiosity! Do you have
any questions about the <clr:0000>sky islands<clr:ffff>?
They're my specialty.
If I'm honest, I don't know much about
anything else.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS>I'm not boring you, am I?


Because I can go on about the <clr:0000>sky islands<clr:ffff>
forever! Go ahead, ask me anything!
Talk_Greeting0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Oh, I remember you... What are you up to
this early?
